Folder.label: VERILOG Component Instantiation
Folder.Template:
// The following must be inserted into your Verilog file for this // core to be instantiated. Change the instance name and port connections // (in parentheses) to your own signal names.
fifo_xlnx_2Kx36_2clk YourInstanceName ( .din(din), // Bus [35 : 0] .rd_clk(rd_clk), .rd_en(rd_en), .rst(rst), .wr_clk(wr_clk), .wr_en(wr_en), .dout(dout), // Bus [35 : 0] .empty(empty), .full(full), .rd_data_count(rd_data_count), // Bus [11 : 0] .wr_data_count(wr_data_count)); // Bus [11 : 0]

// The following must be inserted into your Verilog file for this // core to be instantiated. Change the instance name and port connections // (in parentheses) to your own signal names.
fifo_xlnx_512x36_2clk YourInstanceName ( .din(din), // Bus [35 : 0] .rd_clk(rd_clk), .rd_en(rd_en), .rst(rst), .wr_clk(wr_clk), .wr_en(wr_en), .dout(dout), // Bus [35 : 0] .empty(empty), .full(full), .rd_data_count(rd_data_count), // Bus [9 : 0] .wr_data_count(wr_data_count)); // Bus [9 : 0]

// The following must be inserted into your Verilog file for this // core to be instantiated. Change the instance name and port connections // (in parentheses) to your own signal names.
fifo_xlnx_64x36_2clk YourInstanceName ( .din(din), // Bus [35 : 0] .rd_clk(rd_clk), .rd_en(rd_en), .rst(rst), .wr_clk(wr_clk), .wr_en(wr_en), .dout(dout), // Bus [35 : 0] .empty(empty), .full(full), .rd_data_count(rd_data_count), // Bus [6 : 0] .wr_data_count(wr_data_count)); // Bus [6 : 0]

// The following must be inserted into your Verilog file for this // core to be instantiated. Change the instance name and port connections // (in parentheses) to your own signal names.
fifo_xlnx_16x19_2clk YourInstanceName ( .din(din), // Bus [18 : 0] .rd_clk(rd_clk), .rd_en(rd_en), .rst(rst), .wr_clk(wr_clk), .wr_en(wr_en), .dout(dout), // Bus [18 : 0] .empty(empty), .full(full), .rd_data_count(rd_data_count), // Bus [4 : 0] .wr_data_count(wr_data_count)); // Bus [4 : 0]
